channel.title: Clubhouse - the "hot" voice chat social media platform
channel.description:
Seems to be big in tech and entertainment communities, growing crypto too.
Invite only, but they have been rapidly scaling.
I could see OGM disucssions held on there and opening up to many new comers to ask questions etc.
[Clubhouse: Buzzy Silicon Valley social media app worth $100 million (cnbc.com)](https://www.cnbc.com/2020/05/20/clubhouse-app-is-where-mc-hammer-and-jared-leto-chat-with-vcs.html)

TheWrap – 23 Dec 20

Behind Clubhouse, The Invite-Only App Keeping Hollywood and Silicon Valley...
